Objectives of the Position         
Responsible for sales and business development with Regional Accounts and Global Key Account across
Middle East and Africa. Oilfield chemicals application champion and focal point for Business Line Management
and Global Technical Team. 
Main T asks
•Grow sales of existing Oilfield chemicals accounts (oilfield service companies) in Middle East and Africa and
develop new accounts in the region to support Oilfield Chemicals growth strategy
•Achieve agreed targets of Sales revenue, profitability , costs, inventories, receivables etc.
•Manage critical or complex products requiring high level of client relationship skills to maintain competitive
positioning.
•Develop, communicate and implement Account Strategies in line with sales growth targets
•Evaluate business opportunity , develop specific customer value propositions and plans for implementation,
and selling value added solutions
•Develop and negotiate customer contracts as necessary
•Implement pricing strategy on a customer level and manage account receivables in territory
•Provide and assess market intelligence for marketing, business team including competitor ’s activities,
customer needs, and new market opportunities
•Communicate activities through ef fective use of various tools (Salesforce, CPQ, Outlook etc..) with
appropriate use of visit and monthly reports, Contact documentation, Account strategies and email.
•Input forecasts for assigned customers into the demand planning system
•Support regional and global business and Key Account Management strategy as applicable
•Support the growth initiative by submission and follow up on innovation ideas
•Evaluating, selecting, and managing channels to market that meet the business needs.
•Coordinate field trials for Oilfield chemicals and establish commercial/ technical link between Development
Team, New Business Development and Product Management
Minimum Education and Qualification Required for the Position
Education: Education & training required
Bachelor of Science (B.S.) in Engineering or Science Discipline
Working Experience:
•Ideal candidate would have minimum 5 years of chemical sales experience including 3 years oilfield
chemicals sales with extensive product/market knowledge.
Technical & Professional Knowledge: 
•Strong Oilfield chemicals application skills
•Excellent Relationship skills – multi-level sales skills throughout the customer ’s organization
•Strong selling skills – Lead identification and follow-up, ability to close a sale, presentation, negotiation
•Optimal candidate must be a self-starter with proven track record of success
•Strong interpersonal, communication and influencing skills
•Organizational and planning skills
•Self-motivated, customer-focused, and resourceful individual with strong follow through
Language skills (level):
• Fluent in English, Arabic nice to have
